mapper.select:
select ip_address as loginIp, count(1) as frequency from member_withdraw_history where 1=1
and ip_address = #{ip}
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginDate},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endDate},'%y%m%d')
group by ip_address
having count(1) >= #{count}
ORDER BY create_Time desc

SELECT distinct member_id as memberId, account, real_name as fullName, ip_address as ipAddress, (select count(distinct member_id, COALESCE(ip_address,'null')) from member_withdraw_history where 1=1 and ip_address = ipAddress) as ipCount, account_money money from member_withdraw_history WHERE 1 = 1 and account = #{dto.account} and ip_address = #{dto.loginIp}
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{dto.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{dto.endTime},'%y%m%d')
group by member_id, ip_address order by member_id desc, create_time desc
